info.name: B2B Partnership Laravel API
info.description: Complete API collection for B2B Partnership platform with authentication, store management, downloads, and notifications

request.description: Register a new user with client role
Login with email/phone and password. Token will be automatically saved.
Logout current user and revoke token
Get products with optional category filter
Download demo file for product (public access)
Generate secure download token for purchased product
Get all download tokens for authenticated user
Download file using secure token (replace {token} with actual token)
Register user's FCM token for push notifications
Send test push notification to current user
Get specific download setting by key
Reset all download settings to default values
Send notification to multiple users by role
